title: Carpe Diem Espresso
description:
Our espresso is an intercontinental affair: featuring a blend of premium coffee beans from both Rwanda and Guatemala. While the blend is designed for espresso, you can still create a strong cup of coffee using traditional brewing methods.
 
·      Whole bean, wet-processed, blend
·      Origin: Direct Trade
·      Roast: Medium
·      Acidity: Medium
·      Aroma: Floral
·      Flavors: complex, well rounded, subtly sweet, nutty, spicy, floral, fruity

transcripts: My name is Angel Master Roasting for Toms roasting cup, our Carpe Diem espresso is an intercontinental affair. It is a blend featuring medium roasted premium coffee beans from East Africa and Latin America. Enjoy it early in the morning or after a meal, salud.
